author: Ava Peacock
title: Hearing Back About MT2 Conflict
question: If we have submitted a response to the survey about a conflict with the regularly scheduled midterm 2 time, when should we expect to hear back? Thank you.
instructor_answer:
I'm sure Emily will reply to you early in the week.
Edit from Emily: As specified in @599 and in the survey, we will provide more details to students who are approved to write the alternate exam when this survey closes. Please read announcements carefully before asking questions.
